title: dEvI shrI
sahitya:
dEvi shrI mInalOcanni amba dIna rakSaki tenmadhuraikkadi


anupallavi

  pUvil AlavAi aranum mAlkoLap-pugazh muttamizh mozhi
  mazhalai pazhagit-tavazhum kuzhaviyena vaLar


caraNam    annaiyE malayadva rAjan Inra tanNayE enaiyAL dayai nidhiyE
 ninnaiyE sharaNam ena nambinEnE nityakalyANi yAn unadaDimai
